Value.label: Invert Lock Direction
Value.Help: 0=The motor goes clockwise when unlatched; 1= The motor goes counterclockwise when unlatched

Value.label: Lock Mode
Value.Help: 0=Stepper motor mode wave drive (Power Saving); 1=Stepper motor mode full drive(Normal)

Value.label: Lock Turn Degrees
Value.Help: Factor 10 turn degree( 1 = degrees, 9 = 90 degres, etc. )

Value.label: Lock Normal Close Time
Value.Help: How many seconds from the lock has been unlatched to it automatically close again. If 0 then it's disabled

Value.label: Lock Sound
Value.Help: Enable or Disable the beep sound from latch or unlatch operations( 0 = Disable, 1 = Enable )

Value.label: Battery Type
Value.Help: Set the type of battery that powers the device. This affect the returned battery state. 0 = 3.6V, 1=3.0V

Value.label: Battery Alarm Percent
Value.Help: When the battery level is equal to, or under this value, the device will notify with a beep sound after latch or unlatch
